When reviewing a pull request:
- Check that the pull request contains a line with "Closes #" that references an issue in the issue tracker.
- Check that the contents of the pull request addresses the issue identified in the "Closes #" line.
- Do not suggest any changes that are not explicitly mentioned in the issue identified in the "Closes #" line.
- Do not add any comments that are not explicitly related in the changes described in the issue identified in the "Closes #" line.
- Check that the contents of the pull request do not make any changes other than those in the issue identified in the "Closes #" line.
